title: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes
description: Bug 6322: All types dialog shows obfuscated classes. JDK 1.4 includes obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) etc.
OB: The obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d) are prominently displayed in the Open Type dialog.
EB: The obfuscated classes should be less prominent in the Open Type dialog.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Launch the software.
2. Open the Open Type dialog.
3. Observe the prominent display of obfuscated classes (a, a1, b, c, d).
